title: The Eradication of Vice
description: Idle dilettante Archie Duntisbourne thinks his luck has turned when he hears of an inheritance from his eccentric Great-Aunt Agatha. But the inheritance comes with bizarre and unexpected conditions. The young man must submit to the discipline of a fanatical womenâ€™s organisation dedicated to the suppression of onanism and the reformation of the male gender. Archie finds himself under the control of the beautiful but despotic Miss Harper, who intends to train him to control his desires, urges and habits.
author: Salome Verdad
